Knight Family Punch

Ingredients

  • 2 large cans orange juice
  • 1 large can pineapple
  • 2 pk strawberry Kool-Aid + sugar
  • 3 lemons ( squeezed)
  • 1/2 gal orange sherbet
  • Club Soda
  • Gingerale
  • Sprite

Instructions

  1. Combine
  2. Enjoy
